title: Trump hosts Netanyahu amid growing probes for both
text:
Trump hosts Netanyahu amid growing probes for both 7:50am GMT - 02:01 
The White House welcomed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday as both Trump and Israel's leader deal with investigations they have each called witch hunts. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The White House welcomed Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Monday as both Trump and Israel's leader deal with investigations they have each called witch hunts. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2I6pres
